title: Textile, ca. 1945
inscribed: arrived with attached label,"DAMASK. One of the first all-Nylon Damasks woven- circa 1940. Draperies in Mayor's Office, New York City Hall - 1945.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 70 x 63 cm (27 9/16 x 24 13/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. R. Curt Hasenclever
description: Design of flowering branches in old rose color.
